    • Method Detail

      • animationFinished

        public void animationFinished(com.brashmonkey.spriter.Animation animation)
        Gets called if the current animation has reached it's end or it's beginning (depends on the current set Player.speed).
        Specified by:
        animationFinished in interface com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.PlayerListener
        Parameters:
        animation - the animation which finished.

      • animationChanged

        public void animationChanged(com.brashmonkey.spriter.Animation oldAnim,
                    com.brashmonkey.spriter.Animation newAnim)
        Gets called if the animation of the player gets changed. If Player.setAnimation(Animation) gets called and the new animation is the same as the previous one, this method will not be called.
        Specified by:
        animationChanged in interface com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.PlayerListener
        Parameters:
        oldAnim - the old animation
        newAnim - the new animation

      • preProcess

        public void preProcess(com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player player)
        Gets called before a player updates the current animation.
        Specified by:
        preProcess in interface com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.PlayerListener
        Parameters:
        player - the player which is calling this method.

      • postProcess

        public void postProcess(com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player player)
        Gets called after a player updated the current animation.
        Specified by:
        postProcess in interface com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.PlayerListener
        Parameters:
        player - the player which is calling this method.

      • mainlineKeyChanged

        public void mainlineKeyChanged(com.brashmonkey.spriter.Mainline.Key prevKey,
                      com.brashmonkey.spriter.Mainline.Key newKey)
        Gets called if the mainline key gets changed. If Player.speed is big enough it can happen that mainline keys between the previous and the new mainline key will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        mainlineKeyChanged in interface com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.PlayerListener
        Parameters:
        prevKey - the previous mainline key
        newKey - the new mainline key
